blog.name: kissykindness
blog.title: Treat People with Kindness
blog.description: My place for some writing of the fabulous Harry Styles. Kissy.

title: Mobile Masterlist
body:
So, here is my updated masterlist. They are sorted from latest to the oldest.

View the Masterlist on my blog

Dirty ones will be marked with a star.

One Last Time

Where you thought you were never going to see him again, but then you see him at a party

Holding Hands

A concept

Bora Bora

Where you go on vacation without him, although he had agreed to come

Shooting Stars

Where Harry prepares a surprise for you in his hometown

Sticky Notes

Where you always leave little notes for each other

Sign of the Times

Where you surprise Harry for the second anniversary of his song

Bartender’s Advice

Where Harry needs a little push to tell his best friend how he feels

Three Little Words

Where Harry worries a little bit too much about saying “I love you”

Move in with me

Part Two

Where Harry wants you to move in with him, but you have some issues

Family Ties

Where Anne basically adopts you at first sight

Sharing a Bed

A concept

Panic Attacks

In which you have panic attacks but don’t want to worry Harry because he is away (trigger warning)

Oh! Sweet Nuthin’

A song-based imagine about swaying to some old tunes in the middle of the living room

Late Night Trains*

When you and Harry can finally get some one on one time on the train back home

Dating Harry would include… (Part 2)

Another headcanon

In Sickness and Health

Where Harry is sick but tries to push you away

Happy Place

Where you just don’t want to leave your comfy bed

Dating Harry would include…

A headcanon

Jealousy

Where Harry can’t bear watching you with other guys anymore

Polaroids

Where a box of old photos brings back some memories

Tears - Part 2

Where comforting turns into something else

Tears

Where Harry just needs you to comfort him

Adore

A song-based imagine about a miraculously connection at first sight


These are older ones that I have written a few years back, when Harry was just beginning his solo career, and a few where One Direction where still together.

Play Wrestling

Where Harry accidentally hurts you

Books

Where Harry meets you in a book store and it turns out that you’ve written his favourite book

Harry’s Haircut

Where Harry is not that confident about his haircut, which doesn’t stop you from teasing him about it

Hold on

The one where Harry comes home from work totally exhausted

Falling Asleep On Him

A headcanon

You and I

In which you have to keep Harry warm at the set of the You and I video

Showers

In which Harry joins you in the shower after an exhausting day in a very intimate, yet innocent way

Taking care of sick Harry

In which Harry has a horrible cold and needs his favourite girlfriend around

Periods

In which you stain and worry that Harry is going to be a prick about it

Panty Lines*

In which you worry a little too much about panty lines and Harry shamelessly takes advantage of it

Forgotten Birthday

In which Harry forgets your birthday and you fight

Kisses

A concept

Fashion Week

Where a call from your manager disrupts quality time

Drunk Jealousy

Harry is worried when your ex shows up at a party

Secretly dating

In which you are not dating publicly, but still are in the audience when One Direction is being interviewed

title: Nervous Wreck
body:
Not kidding, I’m pretty sure I have no fingernails left by the amount of biting I had done to them out of deciding whether this drabble is satisfactory or not ‘cause I never know how to write stuff like this so I just wing it.

Word Count: 472

Harry overwhelms (y/n) with his loving words on a ride to visit his family.

Waking up on a weekend, you’d expect a calm and collected (y/n) silently making her own tea and enjoying the beautifully intricate fullness of the morning silence with her back against her boyfriend Harry’s front, unbothered by all the negativity of the outside world – not today.

Because this particular Saturday may end up being low-key uplifting or deadass the worst day of her life. She’ll be paying a quick visit at Harry’s family home for the first time; hence her getting herself so worked out to the point where she’s tugging at her hair in a matter that’s got to genuinely hurt. She doesn’t let Harry see though; she reckons her nervousness will subside on its own, until twenty minutes later when they’re on the road and Harry’s driving.

“I can do this.” She exclaims out of the blue. She doesn’t realize she had said it out loud until she hears her boyfriend’s giggle beside her. “Love, stop worrying!”

“Sorry, baby. I just really want to make a good impression, you feel me?”

“Okay, first of all; you have nothing to worry about, my mum loves everyone.” He clarifies, placing a gentle hand on her thigh. “And second; my parents have always said they don’t care who I date- as long as I believe that she’s truly it for me.”

“You do, don’t you?”

“Without a doubt, (y/n), so cut yourself some slack. You’re doing better than you think.”

They fall into a comfortable, calm silence again and Harry speculates she’s finally assured that his loved ones don’t bite until her panicked voice fills his ears. “But what if they think I’m only here for the money and the fame?”

He leans toward her and smooths his thumb over her forehead, pressing out the lines that have set in there when the car came to a halt because of the traffic. “’S gonna be fine. They’re gonna love you, everything about you.”

“You don’t know that.”

“Do, too. Look, I would always go for someone who could get on with my parents. It’s important to me that my family likes you too, maybe not immediately, but then I know they’ll really get to like you because your personality is so attractive.”

(y/n)’s stunned at how easily just a few touches and some words from him can put her mind at ease. “Yeah?”

He laughs, taking his eyes off the road for a brief second to look at her. “You’re too good to resist.”

(y/n) can’t help smiling. She kind of knows in the back of her mind that there’s no such thing as a smooth ride and that she’d feel absolutely gutted the second she steps foot in Harry’s family home, but she has a feeling that she’d be okay – as long as Harry would hold her hand under the table.

There you go, my first one shot. As always, feedback is welcomed. xx

“I can do this.” She exclaims out of the blue. She doesn’t realize she had said it out loud until she hears her boyfriend’s giggle beside her. “Love, stop worrying!”

[[MORE]]

“Sorry, baby. I just really want to make a good impression, you feel me?”

“Okay, first of all; you have nothing to worry about, my mum loves everyone.” He clarifies, placing a gentle hand on her thigh. “And second; my parents have always said they don’t care who I date- as long as I believe that she’s truly it for me.”

They fall into a comfortable, calm silence again and Harry speculates she’s finally assured that his loved ones don’t bite until her panicked voice fills his ears. “But what if they think I’m only here for the money and the fame?”

“You don’t know that.”

“Do, too. Look, I would always go for someone who could get on with my parents. It’s important to me that my family likes you too, maybe not immediately, but then I know they’ll really get to like you because your personality is so attractive.”

(y/n)’s stunned at how easily just a few touches and some words from him can put her mind at ease. “Yeah?”

He laughs, taking his eyes off the road for a brief second to look at her. “You’re too good to resist.”

(y/n) can’t help smiling. She kind of knows in the back of her mind that there’s no such thing as a smooth ride and that she’d feel absolutely gutted the second she steps foot in Harry’s family home, but she has a feeling that she’d be okay – as long as Harry would hold her hand under the table.

There you go, my first one shot. As always, feedback is welcomed. xx

He laughs, taking his eyes off the road for a brief second to look at her. “You’re too good to resist.”

(y/n) can’t help smiling. She kind of knows in the back of her mind that there’s no such thing as a smooth ride and that she’d feel absolutely gutted the second she steps foot in Harry’s family home, but she has a feeling that she’d be okay – as long as Harry would hold her hand under the table.

There you go, my first one shot. As always, feedback is welcomed. xx
trail.content:
Not kidding, I’m pretty sure I have no fingernails left by the amount of biting I had done to them out of deciding whether this drabble is satisfactory or not ‘cause I never know how to write stuff like this so I just wing it.

Word Count: 472

Harry overwhelms (y/n) with his loving words on a ride to visit his family.

Waking up on a weekend, you’d expect a calm and collected (y/n) silently making her own tea and enjoying the beautifully intricate fullness of the morning silence with her back against her boyfriend Harry’s front, unbothered by all the negativity of the outside world – not today.

Because this particular Saturday may end up being low-key uplifting or deadass the worst day of her life. She’ll be paying a quick visit at Harry’s family home for the first time; hence her getting herself so worked out to the point where she’s tugging at her hair in a matter that’s got to genuinely hurt. She doesn’t let Harry see though; she reckons her nervousness will subside on its own, until twenty minutes later when they’re on the road and Harry’s driving.

“I can do this.” She exclaims out of the blue. She doesn’t realize she had said it out loud until she hears her boyfriend’s giggle beside her. “Love, stop worrying!”

“Sorry, baby. I just really want to make a good impression, you feel me?”

“Okay, first of all; you have nothing to worry about, my mum loves everyone.” He clarifies, placing a gentle hand on her thigh. “And second; my parents have always said they don’t care who I date- as long as I believe that she’s truly it for me.”

“You do, don’t you?”

“Without a doubt, (y/n), so cut yourself some slack. You’re doing better than you think.”

They fall into a comfortable, calm silence again and Harry speculates she’s finally assured that his loved ones don’t bite until her panicked voice fills his ears. “But what if they think I’m only here for the money and the fame?”

He leans toward her and smooths his thumb over her forehead, pressing out the lines that have set in there when the car came to a halt because of the traffic. “’S gonna be fine. They’re gonna love you, everything about you.”

“You don’t know that.”

“Do, too. Look, I would always go for someone who could get on with my parents. It’s important to me that my family likes you too, maybe not immediately, but then I know they’ll really get to like you because your personality is so attractive.”

(y/n)’s stunned at how easily just a few touches and some words from him can put her mind at ease. “Yeah?”

He laughs, taking his eyes off the road for a brief second to look at her. “You’re too good to resist.”

(y/n) can’t help smiling. She kind of knows in the back of her mind that there’s no such thing as a smooth ride and that she’d feel absolutely gutted the second she steps foot in Harry’s family home, but she has a feeling that she’d be okay – as long as Harry would hold her hand under the table.

There you go, my first one shot. As always, feedback is welcomed. xx
trail.content_abstract:
Not kidding, I’m pretty sure I have no fingernails left by the amount of biting I had done to them out of deciding whether this drabble is satisfactory or not ‘cause I never know how to write stuff like this so I just wing it.

Word Count: 472

Waking up on a weekend, you’d expect a calm and collected (y/n) silently making her own tea and enjoying the beautifully intricate fullness of the morning silence with her back against her boyfriend Harry’s front, unbothered by all the negativity of the outside world – not today.

Because this particular Saturday may end up being low-key uplifting or deadass the worst day of her life. She’ll be paying a quick visit at Harry’s family home for the first time; hence her getting herself so worked out to the point where she’s tugging at her hair in a matter that’s got to genuinely hurt. She doesn’t let Harry see though; she reckons her nervousness will subside on its own, until twenty minutes later when they’re on the road and Harry’s driving.

“I can do this.” She exclaims out of the blue. She doesn’t realize she had said it out loud until she hears her boyfriend’s giggle beside her. “Love, stop worrying!”

I have been told that I am a CUTE PERVERT. Mostly, though, I'm a bisexual witch-slash-mermaid-slash-cloud of chaos. 
Honestly, I typically refer to myself as a human trash heap with delusions of grandeur.
"Take me or leave me; or, as is the usual order of things, both." 
— Dorothy Parker
You are always free to ask me anything. My ABOUT section is linked below, as are my pictures.

summary: I’ve been in the 1d fandom for 7 years now, and I have lost connections with so many of my fandom friends. I have forgotten...
body:
I’ve been in the 1d fandom for 7 years now, and I have lost connections with so many of my fandom friends. I have forgotten about the late nights in bed with my phone on twitter and tumblr in 2012, with my walls covered in posters and my earbuds in while I streamed Kiss You on YouTube and retweeting “refresh, not replay!” tweets. I have forgotten about all the insane amount of tweets that would follow when a band member became active on Twitter, in desperate hopes that I would receive a reply from them. I have forgotten all the Wattpad and archiveofourown books that I completely finished in a matter of days and cried over. I have forgotten about After, DARK, and other hugely popular fanfictions. I have forgotten all of the insanely talented viners that made edits of the boys.

It’s crazy that for the past couple of years I’ve seemed to forget the happiest years of my life.

One Direction was so much more than a band. They were the creators of a family, music legends and record breakers, and more. I wish I could take just one day to relieve a day back in 2012.

blog.name: talesofstyles
blog.title: all the love my little ballsacks
blog.description: virginia | i suck at writing, but i still do sometimes.

summary: harrystyles: Sometimes I wish I was good with words so I can write something beautiful and touching and cheesy but in the cool...
body:
harrystyles: Sometimes I wish I was good with words so I can write something beautiful and touching and cheesy but in the cool way. But I’m not. So I’ll just leave this photo here on my feed so I could come back and look at it in a few years (or maybe even next week… you never know) and weep in tears of joy because of how much I love this baby girl of mine and how adorable she is and how fast she grows and how is she even mine. If you need me I’ll just be drowning my sorrows in a glass of red. Or a bottle. #getagripdad

yourusername: 💛💛💛

gemmastyles: You guuuys my niece is a little doll 💔

annetwist: Kiss her on the lips and all over, bring her to nana and let me spoil her 👶🏼💕

fan1: I swear I saw a doll that looks like this yesterday at Toys R Us 😳 she’s too much 😭💔

niallhoran: Congrats again mate. She’s lovely! Can’t wait to get a cuddle soon xx

fan2: Ohhhh Harry I think you killed us 😩😩😩

j_corden: Alright, I’ve seen lots of babies so believe me when I say your baby’s cute. Never ever stop making them. #keepemcoming
